name: busco
description:
Assesses genome assembly and annotation completeness with Benchmarking
Universal Single-Copy Orthologs

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: hmmer
dependencies.description:
HMMER is used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs,
and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using
probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs).

dependencies.name: augustus
dependencies.description:
AUGUSTUS is a program that predicts genes in eukaryotic genomic
sequences

dependencies.name: py-biopython
dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
